short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Detects playlists and subtitles used by streams, incl. custom file extensions and headers. Assembles readymade commands for tools.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Detects playlists and subtitles used by streams, incl. custom file extensions and headers. Assembles readymade commands for tools.

Enhanced Fork of https://github.com/54ac/stream-detector
Adds: MPV, Use website title by default, Disable notifications by default (causes stutter, freezing, when copied link), Remove " - Website" branding for title, skip reading browser cookies for yt-dlp (option)

This is a Firefox and Chrom* addon written in JavaScript which provides an easy way to keep track of URLs to playlists and subtitles used by Apple HLS, Adobe HDS, MPEG-DASH, and Microsoft Smooth Streaming streams as well as download video/audio files directly and monitor any other file extensions and Content-Type headers.

Also assembles readymade yt-dlp/FFmpeg/Streamlink/hlsdl/N_m3u8DL-RE/mpv commands which (should) include all of the necessary cookies and headers.

https://github.com/dw5/stream-detector
